transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] reply kar do usko.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji, Nazim ji bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Haan, mai ye bol rahi thi ki jo aapko bheja hai na maine screenshot, wo actually kal hi meeting hui hai to wo jisme ye aaya hai ki jo bhi star hai, leader hai, jo bhi services chal rahi hai all India ki or se deal wali. Aur even MDC aur Maximizer aur TrustSeal bhi. But abhi MDC Maximizer TrustSeal ka I think agle month se hoga but iska ye December month se applicable ho jayega yani ki jo client package chalate aa rahe hain 72 weekly lead wala agar wo renewal jo unki expiry hai agar uske date ke within the expiry se pehle pehle wo renew kara le rahe hain to unka same ye 72 weekly lead wala hi chalega package. But agar koi client naya lene aata hai ya fir uske service band ho jati hai star leader ki fir wo lene aa raha hai bhale wo expiry ek din ek din ho chuki hai uski agle din lene aa raha hai tab bhi unko ye 48 lead lead wala package milega aur price bhi badha diya inhone.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To aap, aap agar ab band karaoge na to agar jaise aap Maximizer bhi karaoge to usme na lead automatically kam milega aapko. Jo 30 weekly lead aur do daily bonus mil raha tha wo automatically kam ho jayega.
Customer: To us hisab se plan change kar diya.
Executive: Mai bas ye samjhana chah rahi hu.
Customer: Break ki ja rahi hai, hamari lead to break ki ja rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, mai aapko bas ye samjhana chah rahi hu ki aap agar aage jo bhi step aap lijiyega na is hisab se plan karke lijiyega ki aapko us hisab se bylead allocation hoga. Chahe wo star aap continue kar rahe ho ya fir agar aap Maximizer aage continue kar rahe ho to us according. To maine isliye aapko chart bhej diya taki aapko ek cheeze clear rahe aur aapko aage ke liye wo cheeze pata ho to aap us hisab se apna services me bylead ka consumption jo bhi aapko mil pa raha hai us hisab se kar lena aap.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Okay is tarah ho raha hai na allocation isliye.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Par wo isi reason se hi hai jo sold out ho rahi hai na to client matlab kahi na kahi yahi bolte hain ki leads to itni sari padi hai wo kaise use kare hum to kahi na kahi us wajah se lead allocation kam ho ja raha hai aur jo kam hoga uska thoda sa cost jo aapne pay kara hai wahi same cost me ja raha hai aur jinka 72 hai wo highest cost pe ja raha hai aapka 1 lakh plus ki deal pe wo jayega seedhe seedhe.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Per category. To us hisab se aap plan karna, theek hai? Maine aapko bas yahi batane ke liye bhej diya tha. Taki aapko cheeze pata ho jaye pehle se.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Theek hai kuch agar dikkat lage aapko bataiyega.
Customer: Ji ji, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, okay.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states leads are being broken.

- Customer expresses concern about lead allocation.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the new lead allocation policy.

- Executive sent a chart for better understanding.



Next Steps: 

- Customer was asked to report any issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, allocation, maximizer
